title.rendered: 2024-2025 Regional Campus/La Verne Online Tuition and Fees

content.rendered:
Tuition costs and a comprehensive list of fees for students at one of La Verne’s regional campuses. Note: Not all fees may apply.

Tuition

Costs are calculated per semester hour.

Campus Undergraduate Graduate
Regional Campuses, per semester hour $665
RN to BS in Nursing, per semester hour $665
Regional Campuses – Education Graduate Program, per semester hour $760
Regional Campuses (MHA), per semester hour $805
Regional Campuses (ACCT, FIN, MBA, MSLM), per semester hour $955
Active Duty Military Rate, per semester hour $250 $395

Fees

 

Appeals $50
Application $50
Auditing, per semester hour one-half normal tuition
Community Service Assessment $50
Course Challenge one semester hour of tuition
Deferred Payment Plan Fee – per semester $75
Graduation Fee (Undergraduate)
Graduation Fee (Graduate)		 $140
$160
Late Financial Arrangement $100-300
Missed Payment Fee $35
Professional Development Courses (700-level, non-degree credit), per semester hour $135
Registration Fee, per course $30
Returned Check/Rejected Credit Card $25
Teacher Performance Assessment (TPA) $50-100
Teacher Performance Assessment (TPA) Late Fee $50-100
Transcript, per copy $12
Transcript sent certified mail, per copy $15
Transcript (24-hour turnaround), per copy $20
Transcript (special handling/mailing request), per copy $35

The University of La Verne reserves the right to establish a varying tuition rate for new programs established at new sites when there are unusual operating conditions.
